Sequence Information.Peptide Name: EsALF-2 (E. sinensis anti-lipopolysaccharide factor 2; natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals;1S=S; BBL)
Sequence Information.Source: gill (high expression); haemocytes, hepatopancreas and muscle (moderate expression), Chinese mitten crab,Eriocheir sinensis

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against G- bacterium L. anguillarum and antifungal activity against P. pastoris, but not active against M.luteus and S.aureus. A conserved disulfide bond is predicted between Cys27 and Cys48.Recombinant production:bacteria: activity testing using recombinant peptide.
Literature Information.Author: Zhang Y, Wang L, Wang L, Yang J, Gai Y, Qiu L, Song L.2010
Literature Information.Title: The second anti-lipopolysaccharide factor (EsALF-2) with antimicrobial activity from Eriocheir sinensis
